description.value:
You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people. You gain the critical specialization effects of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Battle Axe], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Hatchet], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Longsword], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Shortsword].

Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in the above four weapons.
